armoury.name: Arcanite Token
armoury.description:
One use only. When used, choose one effect:

  • Grant +1AP to the Character for their Activation.
  • Add an extra D6 to any roll.
  • Allow another Spell to be cast.
  • Allow a D6 to be re-rolled.

armoury.name: Shield
armoury.description: If equipped, a Character may re-roll one failed Defence roll per Round.

armoury.name: Spear
armoury.description: If equipped, a Character may make Melee Attacks against targets up to 2" away, even if they aren't in base contact. Attacks may still be made if there is a friendly Character between the Character and the target.

armoury.name: Torch
armoury.description:
If equipped, a Character counts as Fearsome to Beasts and Monsters. In addition, the Character counts as Fearsome and has +1 Power on all Melee Attacks against Characters who are Flammable.

However, enemy Characters may re-roll Failures when attempting Feat rolls for Ranged Attacks against a Torch-carrying Character, as they are much easier to spot from afar.

armoury.name: Two Handed Weapon
armoury.description: If equipped, a Character gets +2 Power for all Melee Attacks. However, any of their own Critical Defends are discarded as if they were Failures.

armoury.name: Dual Weapons
armoury.description: If equipped, a Character may re-roll every 1 when making a Melee Attack.

armoury.name: Light Armour
armoury.description: If equipped, a Character gains +1 Armour. This does not stack.

armoury.name: Heavy Armour
armoury.description: If equipped, a Character gains +2 Armour. This does not stack. In addition, any Leg It rolls are at +1 difficulty.
